stroke-width.description: The width of the progress bar, in px
stroke-width.description_zh: 进度条的宽度，单位 px

text-inside.description: The progress bar display text is built into the progress bar (only available when type=line)
text-inside.description_zh: 进度条显示文字内置在进度条内（只在 type=line 时可用）

status.description: The current status of the progress bar

color.description: Progress bar background color (overrides the status color)
color.description_zh: 进度条背景色（会覆盖 status 状态颜色）

:width.description: Circular progress bar canvas width (only available when type is Circle or Dashboard)
:width.description_zh: 环形进度条画布宽度（只在 type 为 circle 或 dashboard 时可用）

show-text.description: Whether to display the text content of the progress bar
show-text.description_zh: 是否显示进度条文字内容

stroke-linecap.description: circle/dashboard type, shape at both ends of the path
stroke-linecap.description_zh: circle/dashboard 类型路径两端的形状

:format.description: Specify the text content of the progress bar

define-back-color.description: Specify the background color of the progress bar (hex format supported)
define-back-color.description_zh: 指定进度条底色（支持 hex 格式）

text-color.description: Specify the progress bar font color (supports hex format)
text-color.description_zh: 指定进度条字体颜色（支持 hex 格式）
